dict.string: Search by list filter for HC Team Activity.

query=$1
/usr/bin/open -na "Brave Browser"
sleep 2
open "https://looker.a8c.com/dashboards/477?Report+Date+Start=2023%2F04%2F01+to+2023%2F04%2F30&Upwork+team=English+Language+Support+Team&Upwork+name=Kudakwashe+Zafevere"

#!/bin/bash
# Get the selected item from the argument passed by Alfred selected_item="$1"
# Replace "test" in the URL with the selected item url="https://mc.a8c.com/team-activity/?member=${selected_item// /%20}&weeks=4"
# Open the URL in the user's default browser open "$url"

tell application "Brave Browser" set tabList to tabs of front window set urlList to {} repeat with aTab in tabList set end of urlList to URL of aTab end repeat end tell
set {TID, text item delimiters} to {text item delimiters, return} set urlList to urlList as text set text item delimiters to TID
set the clipboard to urlList
External Trigger -- Link to Other Alfred Workflows

Open the HC Looker URL for the previous month, but with a 2-second delay.
Requires Updating Monthly
Open the HC Looker URL from the previous week in a new Brave browser window, but with a 2-second delay.
